description: Starter flashcard dataset for yoga pose memorization and teaching practice.

alignmentCues: Stand with feet grounded and legs active.
Stack ribs over hips and shoulders over ribs.
Lengthen through the crown of the head.

general: Root down to rise up.
Soften the jaw and breathe evenly.
beginner: Keep feet hip-width apart for balance.
Practice near a wall to feel upright alignment.
limitedMobility: Use a chair behind you for support.
Keep a soft bend in the knees if needed.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Mountain Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Bend knees and sit hips back like a chair.
Keep chest lifted while drawing low ribs in.
Reach arms up without shrugging shoulders.

general: Weight stays in the heels.
Lengthen the spine as the hips move back.
beginner: Keep hands at heart center first.
limitedMobility: Use wall support for balance.
Sit to a block to guide safe depth.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Chair Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Hinge from hips before rounding spine.
Keep a soft bend in knees as needed.
Let head and neck relax fully.

general: Lengthen on inhale, fold deeper on exhale.
Shift weight slightly toward balls of feet.
beginner: Hands on blocks can reduce strain.
limitedMobility: Place hands on thighs or shins.
Practice with feet wider than hips.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Forward Fold, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Lengthen spine forward to a flat back shape.
Press hands into shins or blocks.
Draw shoulders away from ears.

general: Think long spine, not high chest.
Keep neck neutral with gaze down.
beginner: Bend knees to keep spine straight.
limitedMobility: Use chair seat as hand support.
Keep hands higher to reduce hamstring pull.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Halfway Lift, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Spread fingers and press through entire hands.
Lift hips up and back to lengthen spine.
Keep knees soft if hamstrings are tight.

general: Prioritize long spine over straight legs.
Rotate upper arms outward gently.
limitedMobility: Use blocks under hands.
Try hands on wall in a half-dog variation.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Downward-Facing Dog, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Stack shoulders directly over wrists.
Press heels back and crown forward.
Keep hips level with torso.

general: Create one long line from head to heels.
Push floor away to engage upper back.
limitedMobility: Practice plank at wall or countertop.
Use fists or wedges for wrist comfort.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Plank Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Lower halfway with elbows hugging ribs.
Keep shoulders no lower than elbows.
Maintain core and leg engagement.

general: Move as one unit from plank.
Keep collarbones broad.
beginner: Lower all the way to belly if needed.
limitedMobility: Use blocks under shoulders for depth feedback.
Replace with knees-chest-chin variation.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Four-Limbed Staff Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Press into hands and tops of feet.
Lift thighs off floor.
Broaden chest and keep neck long.

general: Lead from chest, not chin.
Keep shoulders moving away from ears.
beginner: Use Cobra Pose as a regression.
limitedMobility: Try Sphinx Pose instead.
Use blocks under hands.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Upward-Facing Dog, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Press pubic bone toward mat for support.
Lift chest using back body strength.
Keep elbows slightly bent and close in.

general: Draw shoulder blades down the back.
Lengthen through crown.
beginner: Keep hands light and lift lower.
limitedMobility: Use Baby Cobra with very small lift.
Place folded blanket under ribs.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Cobra Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Fold hips toward heels with relaxed torso.
Forehead rests on mat or support.
Arms forward or alongside body.

general: Allow breath to widen the back body.
This is a rest point anytime.
beginner: Knees can be wide for more space.
limitedMobility: Support chest with a bolster.
Place blanket between hips and heels.

commonMistakes: Holding tension in neck and jaw.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Child's Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Hands under shoulders and knees under hips.
Round spine from tailbone to head.
Press floor away to broaden shoulder blades.

general: Move one vertebra at a time.
Link spinal movement to breath.
limitedMobility: Practice seated Cat on a chair.
Use fists if wrist extension is limited.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Cat Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Hands under shoulders and knees under hips.
Tilt pelvis to lift sit bones and chest.
Keep back of neck long.

general: Lead from sternum as tail lifts.
Keep lower belly gently engaged.
limitedMobility: Try seated Cow with hands on knees.
Use padding under knees.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Cow Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Front knee tracks over front ankle.
Back knee stays under hip line.
Lift chest while drawing ribs in.

general: Press down to rise up through torso.
Square hips gently toward front.
beginner: Keep back toes tucked for stability.
limitedMobility: Pad back knee with blanket.
Reduce lunge depth.

commonMistakes: Front knee passing far beyond ankle.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Low Lunge, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Front knee stacks over ankle.
Back leg stays straight and active.
Torso rises upright with hips square.

general: Root through feet to stabilize pelvis.
Lift through side waist.
limitedMobility: Use wall support with front hand.
Lower back knee to modify.

commonMistakes: Back heel turning out too far.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of High Lunge, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Front knee bends toward 90 degrees.
Back foot grounds at slight angle.
Hips and chest orient forward.

general: Press outer back foot firmly down.
Lift arms while softening shoulders.
beginner: Hands on hips if balance is challenging.
limitedMobility: Reduce front knee depth.
Keep hands at heart center.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Warrior I, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Feet wide with front heel aligned to back arch.
Front knee stacks over front ankle.
Arms extend at shoulder height.

general: Reach strongly through both fingertips.
Keep torso centered over pelvis.
beginner: Bend front knee less deeply at first.
limitedMobility: Use a chair under front thigh for support.
Hands can stay on hips.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Warrior II, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Hinge torso forward while lifting back leg.
Keep hips level and square to floor.
Reach crown forward and heel back.

general: Create one long line head to heel.
Micro-bend standing knee to stabilize.
beginner: Keep lifted leg lower than hip height first.
limitedMobility: Practice with hands on wall.
Use chair support under hands.

commonMistakes: Dropping chest too low without core support.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Warrior III, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Straighten front leg while engaging thigh.
Hinge from front hip before placing hand.
Stack shoulders and broaden chest.

general: Lengthen both sides of waist equally.
Use a block under lower hand as needed.
beginner: Keep top hand on hip first.
limitedMobility: Place lower hand on shin or chair.
Keep slight bend in front knee.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Triangle Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Front thigh tracks toward parallel with floor.
Bottom hand to block or forearm to thigh.
Top arm reaches long overhead.

general: Lengthen from back heel to top fingertips.
Rotate chest open without collapsing lower body.
limitedMobility: Use block at highest height.
Keep top hand on hip if shoulder is sensitive.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Extended Side Angle, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Root through standing foot evenly.
Press lifted foot into inner calf or thigh.
Lengthen spine and steady gaze.

general: Press foot and leg into each other.
Fix eyes on one still point.
beginner: Keep toes of lifted foot on mat as kickstand.
Hands at heart before reaching overhead.
limitedMobility: Practice near wall for fingertip support.
Use chair back for one hand.

commonMistakes: Foot pressing directly into knee joint.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Tree Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Square hips toward the front of the mat.
Lengthen spine before rotating the torso.
Ground through back heel to stabilize twist.

general: Twist from ribcage, not neck.
Keep front leg active and lifted.
beginner: Use a block under lower hand.
limitedMobility: Keep top hand on hip.
Bend front knee slightly.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Revolved Triangle, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Front knee stacks over ankle.
Lengthen spine before pressing palms.
Keep back leg straight and strong.

general: Twist up through the heart center.
Press palms evenly to support rotation.
beginner: Use block at outer front foot.
limitedMobility: Hands at heart instead of floor.
Practice open twist lunge first.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Revolved Side Angle, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Square hips toward front leg.
Lengthen spine before folding over front thigh.
Press firmly through back heel.

general: Keep front hip drawing back.
Use breath to lengthen then fold.
beginner: Hands on blocks on each side of front foot.
limitedMobility: Micro-bend front knee.
Keep torso higher and spine long.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Pyramid Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Feet parallel and legs active.
Hinge at hips with long spine.
Shift weight slightly toward balls of feet.

general: Lift halfway on inhale, fold on exhale.
Keep inner arches lifting.
beginner: Bend knees if low back rounds.
limitedMobility: Hands on chair seat.
Take smaller stance width.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Wide-Legged Forward Fold, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Feet slightly wider than hips with toes turned out.
Draw chest forward as hips sink down.
Press elbows to inner knees for length.

general: Lift through spine while grounding feet.
Relax shoulders away from ears.
beginner: Sit on a block for support.
Keep heels lifted with blanket if needed.
limitedMobility: Use wall behind back for support.
Practice half squat variation.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Garland Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Take a wide stance with toes turned out.
Bend knees over toes with neutral pelvis.
Lift chest while keeping ribs controlled.

general: Press knees out while rooting feet down.
Imagine back sliding down a wall.
beginner: Hands at heart center for focus.
limitedMobility: Use chair behind hips.
Hold onto wall with one hand.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Goddess Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Sit hips back while wrapping one leg over the other.
Wrap arms and lift elbows to shoulder height.
Stack shoulders over hips and gaze steady.

general: Squeeze inner thighs for stability.
Lift elbows while dropping shoulders.
limitedMobility: Use figure-four arms only.
Hold wall lightly for balance.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Eagle Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Place lower hand under shoulder on block or floor.
Stack hips and open chest sideways.
Flex lifted foot and extend through heel.

general: Root down through standing leg to lift up.
Keep top hip directly over bottom hip.
beginner: Keep top hand on hip first.
limitedMobility: Use high block under lower hand.
Softer standing knee bend.

commonMistakes: Top hip rolling backward too far.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Half Moon, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Grip inner foot or ankle of lifted leg.
Press foot into hand as torso reaches forward.
Keep standing leg steady and chest broad.

general: Kick back and lift from the heart.
Find one fixed drishti point.
limitedMobility: Practice quad stretch at wall first.
Use opposite hand on chair for balance.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Dancer Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Shift weight into standing leg and lift opposite knee.
Hold big toe with peace fingers or strap.
Lengthen spine while extending lifted leg.

general: Stand tall before extending leg.
Keep both side waists long.
beginner: Keep lifted knee bent and hold shin.
limitedMobility: Practice with heel on chair.
Use wall support with free hand.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Standing Hand to Big Toe, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Root through standing foot and hinge forward.
Lift back leg as hips stay mostly square.
Hands ground on mat or blocks.

general: Lift from inner thigh of top leg.
Keep torso close to standing leg.
limitedMobility: Soft bend in standing knee.
Hands to chair or wall support.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Standing Split, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Bend one knee deeply while opposite leg extends.
Keep bent knee tracking over toes.
Lift chest with spine long.

general: Press grounded foot to stabilize knee.
Lengthen through extended leg heel.
limitedMobility: Reduce depth significantly.
Use chair support in front.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Side Lunge, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Kneel on one shin with opposite leg extended side.
Stack shoulders over hips before side bend.
Reach top arm long over ear.

general: Lengthen both sides before leaning.
Ground through extended foot edge.
beginner: Keep top hand on hip initially.
limitedMobility: Sit on blanket under kneeling knee.
Reduce side bend range.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Gate Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Sit hips back into Chair foundation.
Bring palms together at chest.
Hook elbow outside opposite thigh and rotate.

general: Keep knees aligned and even.
Lengthen spine before deepening twist.
beginner: Keep twist gentle with hands at heart.
Place block between thighs for alignment.
limitedMobility: Twist with hands on hips only.
Practice seated twist on chair.

commonMistakes: One knee sliding ahead of other.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Revolved Chair, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Ground lower hand under shoulder on block.
Lift back leg to hip height and square hips.
Rotate chest open while stabilizing standing leg.

general: Stabilize first, then rotate.
Keep lifted leg active and straight.
beginner: Practice with top hand on hip.
limitedMobility: Stay in revolved lunge variation.
Use two blocks for support.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Revolved Half Moon, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Hands shoulder-width with fingers spread.
Knees place high on triceps.
Lean forward until feet feel light.

general: Look forward, not straight down.
Engage core and hug heels toward seat.
beginner: Use block under feet to start.
Practice one-foot lift at a time.
limitedMobility: Work prep with knees on upper arms and toes down.
Use cushion in front for confidence.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Crow Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Begin in a deep twist squat.
Stack knees onto upper arm shelf.
Lean forward to shift weight into hands.

general: Twist deeply before lift-off.
Keep elbows bending straight back.
beginner: Start with one foot lifted only.
limitedMobility: Practice seated twist + crow prep separately.
Use props and avoid full lift.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Side Crow, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Hook one leg high over shoulder.
Cross ankles and squeeze legs firmly.
Bend elbows to shift weight forward.

general: Press down strongly through both palms.
Keep legs active to stay lifted.
beginner: Work with one leg lifted first.
limitedMobility: Use preparatory hip-openers only.
Skip full bind if hamstrings are tight.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Eight-Angle Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Slide shoulders under legs as deeply as possible.
Hands plant firmly behind heels.
Straighten legs forward while lifting hips.

general: Squeeze legs inward against arms.
Press floor down to lift chest.
beginner: Use blocks under hands for leverage.
limitedMobility: Focus on deep hamstring prep only.
Work seated lift variations instead.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Firefly Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.

alignmentCues: Place elbows into abdomen with hands on floor.
Lean forward and extend legs straight back.
Lift feet while keeping body parallel to floor.

general: Shift weight gradually forward.
Keep core and glutes strongly engaged.
beginner: Start with knees on floor and lean practice.
Use blocks beneath shoulders for confidence.
limitedMobility: Use wrist prep and forearm strengthening only.
Skip full pose if wrist pain occurs.

image.prompt: Photorealistic studio photo of Peacock Pose, full body visible, neutral background, clear alignment.
